body_html:
I‘ve encountered the same problem.

OS: Windows 10, x64,
Bazel 0.5.4,
MSYS2,
Python 2.7,
GPU-support enabled: CUDA 9.0 Toolkit, cuDNN 7.0,
Visual Studio 2017 community,

build command issued in MSYS2:

bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-march=native --config=mkl --config=win-cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
I‘ve encountered the same problem.

OS: Windows 10, x64,
Bazel 0.5.4,
MSYS2, 
Python 2.7,
GPU-support enabled: CUDA 9.0 Toolkit, cuDNN 7.0,
Visual Studio 2017 community,

build command issued in MSYS2: 

`bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --copt=-msse4.2 --copt=-march=native --config=mkl --config=win-cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
